java/liquibase/ant/AntFileOpener.java

00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00004 import org.apache.tools.ant.AntClassLoader;
00005 import org.apache.tools.ant.Project;
00006 import org.apache.tools.ant.types.Path;
00007 
00008 import java.io.IOException;
00009 import java.io.InputStream;
00010 import java.net.URL;
00011 import java.security.AccessController;
00012 import java.security.PrivilegedAction;
00013 import java.util.Enumeration;
00014 
00018 public class AntFileOpener implements FileOpener {
00019     private AntClassLoader loader;
00020 
00021     public AntFileOpener(final Project project, final Path classpath) {
00022         loader = AccessController.doPrivileged(new PrivilegedAction<AntClassLoader>() {
00023             public AntClassLoader run() {
00024                 return new AntClassLoader(project, classpath);
00025             }
00026         });
00027     }
00028 
00029     public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String file) throws IOException {
00030         URL resource = loader.getResource(file);
00031         if (resource == null) {
00032             return null;
00033         }
00034         return resource.openStream();
00035     }
00036 
00037     public Enumeration<URL> getResources(String packageName) throws IOException {
00038         return loader.getResources(packageName);
00039     }
00040 
00041     public ClassLoader toClassLoader() {
00042         return loader;
00043     }
00044 }
